title: 3House - openHAB client
summary: A client for the automation software openHAB.
description: A client for the automation software OpenHAB.Features:- Supports multiple servers.- Tasker support.- Custom controllers.- Push notifications.help translate:https://oswmdvr.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project?id=71199Try out beta build:https://play.google.com/apps/testing/treehou.se.habitLanguage skillsWant to contribute?https://github.com/ibaton/3HouseOpenHAB:http://www.openhab.org/
descriptionHTML:
A client for the automation software OpenHAB.

Features:
- Supports multiple servers.
- Tasker support.
- Custom controllers.
- Push notifications.

help translate:
https://oswmdvr.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project?id=71199

comments: Feb 21: finally no longer crashing. super happy to have this app back  Update Jan27: Still crashing on load. running Galaxy S7 on Android 7.0  Update jan 13 2018: the latest update released has caused the app to no longer work. every time i start it.. it crashes.   Old review: works really well. I have a problem where it won't connect to my server if I'm over 3G. the moment i'm on WiFi the connection is established...
Moto G5 with Android 7.0 now likes the app again. Thanks for the fix
It crashes every time on launch with latest Android 8.1.0
The controller does not work with more than 2 rows

constantly crashes after last update Android version 6.0.1. Used to work perfectly fine, now crashes after any action (for example switch selection). please fix. UDPATE: no longer crashes on switch selection. Back to 5 stars
Crash android 6 When click a switch program shutdown.
